comment: This is probably the easiest A I have ever gotten in a class. She was very easy to get a hold of and she is really good about reminders for exams or projects. There is one project where you have to go to an exam and write a short paper but that was probably the "hardest part." Take her if you want an easy class.
I had online so mostly textbook-based. I would take her to fill my art credit.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: This class is literally so easy. It's like she understands that majority of us are just taking this class because we have to, not because we're art majors. As long as you turn everything in, this class is such an easy A. The assignments are so easy. No camera on exams and everything is open note. Super, super easy class. Definitely recommend.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Very easy class. She told the class on the first day that attendance isnt required and all test and quizzes will be online with no webcam. I never returned to class and got an A.

I had a bad semester this year due to several circumstances, & Professor Jones's class is the only one that didn't make me feel like I was drowning. She condenses any & all lectures she does to the best of her ability to make it easier to understand, & had very little assignments; her doing kahoots REALLY helped on exams. LOVED being in this class!
